newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Josephthal ups three bank stocks.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Josephthal ups three bank stocks.

text.p: -- Josephthal Lyon & Ross analyst Frank Barkocy said he raised Norwest Corp, KeyCorp and PNC Bank Corp to buy from hold
-- Six-12 month price targets are $55/shr for Norwest, $59/shr for KeyCorp and $46/shr for PNC
-- Analyst said reinstatement of buy rating reflects "price action" in financial stocks which have sold off sharply, also "attractive quarterly fundamentals" expected in Q1 earnings due in mid-April
